mapper.select: SELECT concat('JOIN_CACHE:country_', country_code) AS cache_key, country_code, name_cn, name_en FROM country where country_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:airCarrier_', carrier_code) as cache_key, carrier_code, name_cn, name_en from air_carrier where carrier_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:airPort_' , port_code) as cache_key, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country from air_port where port_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:seaPort_',port_code) as cache_key, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country from sea_port where port_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:seaCarrier_',carrier_code) as cache_key, carrier_code, name_cn, name_en from sea_carrier where carrier_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:commodity_unit_',unit_code) as cache_key, unit_code, unit_name from commodity_unit where unit_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:special_commodity_',code) as cache_key, code, special_commodity_name, special_commodity_name_en from special_commodity where code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:surcharge_',code) as cache_key, code, charge_name, charge_name_en, computing_formula, currency from surcharge where code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:weight_way_',code) as cache_key, code, weight_way_name, weight_way_name_en, computing_formula from weight_way where code in(${keys})
